TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract BitmapDecoder extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public MustInherit Class BitmapDecoder Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 表示位图帧的容器。

span.span: Represents a container for bitmap frames.

summary.span: 每个位图帧是 。

span.span: Each bitmap frame is a .

summary.span: 此抽象类为所有派生解码器对象提供一组基本功能。

span.span: This abstract class provides a base set of functionality for all derived decoder objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是本身; 相反，它是一个用于对象。 is not a itself; rather, it is a container for objects. 每个容器中都可能具有不同属性，包括不同的大小、 分辨率或调色板。Each in the container can potentially have different attributes, including different sizes, resolutions, or palettes. 除非选择了特定的编解码器，否则[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用自动运行时发现来识别图像的格式并将其与合适的编解码器匹配。Unless a specific codec is selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses automatic run-time discovery to identify the format of an image and match it with the appropriate codec. 此发现进程允许开发的支持的编解码器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isv](~/includes/tlasharptla-isv-md.md)]为可由系统自动发现。This discovery process allows a codec developed by an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isv](~/includes/tlasharptla-isv-md.md)] to be automatically discoverable by the system. 若要选择特定的编码解码器，派生或，如类中，应使用。To select a specific codec, the derived or , such as the class, should be used. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]是唯一实现支持多个帧的图像格式。 and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] are the only implemented image formats that support multiple frames. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来创建给定图像的解码器。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a decoder for a given image. 第一个的映像用作的源控件。The first of the image is used as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapDecoderExample.cs#bitmapdecodercreate)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapDecoderExample.vb#bitmapdecodercreate)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用内置的打开并解码[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]位图。The following code example demonstrates how to use the built in to open and decode a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap. 生成用作的元素。The resulting is used as the of an element. [!code-csharp[bitmapframeexample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#4)] [!code-vb[bitmapframeexample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用缓存选项，如果你想要关闭`bitmapStream`解码器创建后。Use the cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the decoder is created. 默认值缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直至需要位图，并且由垃圾回收器处理清理。The default cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来创建给定图像的解码器。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a decoder for a given image. 第一个的映像用作的源控件。The first of the image is used as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreateStream](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapDecoderExample.cs#bitmapdecodercreatestream)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapDecoderCreateStream](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapDecoderExample.vb#bitmapdecodercreatestream)]

summary.span: 当 完成位图内容下载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a has finished downloading bitmap content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 针对所有类型的位图内容可能不会引发此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在通过垃圾回收回收 之前，释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

permission.span: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

span.span: for access to unmanaged resources.
Security action:.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Thumbnail As BitmapSource

summary.span: 获取一个 ，用于表示位图的缩略图（如果已定义）。

span.span: Gets a that represents the thumbnail of the bitmap, if one is defined.
A that represents a thumbnail of the bitmap.

value.span: 如果未定义任何缩略图，则此属性将返回 。

span.span: If no thumbnail is defined, this property returns .
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本机格式的任何支持全局缩略图。None of the native formats support global thumbnails. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)]支持可以使用访问的框架级缩略图属性。, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] support frame-level thumbnails that can be accessed using the property. 返回此属性被冻结。The returned by this property is frozen.
